availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Watson Walker in Nelson County, Kentucky, on March 17, 1824. Father of Hercules Walker, Amanda Walker Burnett, Gabriella Walker Dodge, John Walker, William Walker, Laura Walker, James Walker, and Mortimer Walker. Farmer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 233A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000009667.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994040, Jefferson County Marriages.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Jefferson County Administrators Bonds, 1862-1872, p. 31.
